About Me

I am an enthusiastic tech lover who is reaching out for a career in software industry. I like going straight to the doing without fooling around with unnecessary things. I have been interested in computers since I was 3 years old and have not been able to differentiate myself from them since then. I am currently studying software engineering in LUT University in Lappeenranta for my second year, and I have Mechanical Engineering as a minor.

By nature I am very meticulous and whenever I start doing something I will do my job until it is finished. I really like to build things and see the finished end result. I spend most of my time alone in front of computer screen, but my hobbies include filmmaking and geocaching. My past work experience consists mainly of small video projects that I have made for multiple parties as a part of the hobby. I have also worked with sound and light technology and installed them for small events.

In future I plan to continue my studies with Master's Degree and hopefully specialize in Mechatronics and Machine Automation. I am looking forward to accumulate work experience during my studies – especially during the summer.
